milestones.title: Full Stack Web Development Completed
milestones.description: I will complete full-stack web development by October 31, 2025, and be fluent in English, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Build a Micro AI SaaS Product
milestones.description: Between November 1 and December 31, 2025, I will build a micro AI SaaS product, InshaAllah, from which I can earn at least $1,000 monthly.
